articles.description: West Ham are currently blocking any potential Wolves move for striker Michail Antonio, the Express & Star understands.
articles.content:
Wolves are after proven Premier League experience in the January transfer window and have a long-standing admiration for Antonio.
They are eager to make another forward signing this month and would … [+1066 chars]
